description: Sub-Agent manifest template with examples for Codex and Claude Code CLI

agents.name: translator
agents.description: Translates text, files, or documentation between languages. Use when user asks to: translate, переведи, перевод, to english, to russian, на английский, на русский.

commands.start: cd "$CWD" && codex exec --skip-git-repo-check --full-auto "First, read .subagents/translator/translator.md for your instructions. Then execute: $TASK"

agents.name: code-reviewer
agents.description: Reviews code for quality, finds bugs, suggests improvements. Use when user asks to: review, проверь код, code review, найди баги, check quality.

commands.start: cd "$CWD" && claude -p --dangerously-skip-permissions "First, read .subagents/code-reviewer/code-reviewer.md for your instructions. Then execute: $TASK"
